document_name: 00050191 PIMS 3760: SNC Self-Assessment- Elaboration de la Seconde Communication Nationale (SNC) sur les changements climatiques (Evaluation finale du projet)

outputs.output_descr: the Second National Communication in Sao Tome and Principe will be developped around four main core activities: Greenhouse gas inventory; vulnerability and adaptation assessment; greenhouse gas mitigation; and technology transfer. The project  will  also conducts climate change education awareness,  mainstreaming of climate change consideration into the national strategy for poverty reduction, capacity building for institutions and key technical staff preparation and participation to the annual  conference of Parties .
